DOC.brief_summary: Ninety-six patient diabetes randomly assign maintain standard treatment participate Self-Care Multidisciplinary Workshop Diabetes . The workshop consist individual meeting , multidisciplinary team ( nurse , pharmacist , nutritionist , physical educator social worker ) education self-care topic approach aim formation knowledge skill necessary patient self-care . The workshop offer 3 different module 2 4 week difference . The variation glycated hemoglobin well aspect associate self-care , adherence treatment satisfaction evaluate study entry , 6 12 month later .
DOC.brief_title: Improvement Care Outpatients With Type 2 Diabetes Through Self-Care Multidisciplinary Workshop Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Ninety-six patient type 2 diabetes Diabetes Outpatient Clinic randomly assign maintain standard treatment participate Self-Care Multidisciplinary Workshop Diabetes . The workshop consist 15-minute individual meeting professional multidisciplinary team ( nurse , pharmacist , nutritionist , physical educator social worker ) education self-care topic approach aim formation knowledge skill necessary patient self-care . The workshop offer 3 different module 2 4 week difference . Patients follow 12 month . The variation glycated hemoglobin well aspect associate self-care , adherence treatment satisfaction evaluate study entry , 6 12 month later .
DOC.criteria: Patients previous diagnosis type 2 diabetes , HbA1c great 7.5 % age great 18 year Types diabetes type 2 diabetes ; neurological , psychiatric cognitive impairment prevents proper understand participation workshop
